mapper.insert:
insert into learningspirit.login_log(login_time, open_id, nick_name, log_remark, role) values
(#{entity.loginTime}, #{entity.openId}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.logRemark}, #{entity.role})

insert into learningspirit.login_log(login_time, open_id, nick_name, log_remark, role) values
(#{entity.loginTime}, #{entity.openId}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.logRemark}, #{entity.role})
on duplicate key update login_time = values(login_time) , open_id = values(open_id) , nick_name = values(nick_name) , log_remark = values(log_remark) , role = values(role)
